title: ★ COSY ★ 1 Bdrm in Allston ★Avail 9/1
posting_body: Close to St. Elizabeth Medical Center and walkable to Sutherland Road Train Station - Green line "B".
This is bright and sunny 1 bed 1 bath apartment.
It has a eat in kitchen with beautiful wood cabinets, granite countertops and stainless steel appliances.
Wood floor throughout and the laundry is in the basement.
Bus: 86 Chestnut Hill Ave @ Union St (0.15 mi)
Bus: 501 Winship St @ Union St (0.12 mi)
Bus: 65 Washington St @ Snow St (0.11 mi)
